languages.english-overview:
Hesk is Free PHP Help Desk Software that runs with a MySQL database. It allows you to setup a web based ticket support system (helpdesk) for your website.
Once the Help Desk Software is installed your customers will be able to submit support tickets and staff will have an easy-to-use web interface to manage customer support requests.

ul.li: custom fields in the "Submit a ticket" form
anti-SPAM checks when submitting a ticket
e-mail notifications of new tickets and replies
rating of staff replies and knowledgebase articles
easy to translate to any language
